description.value:
The elemental metal in your bloodline literally courses through your veins in the form of liquid metals like mercury, rubidium, gallium, and djezet, giving your actions a languid fluidity. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Acrobatics. If you would automatically become trained in Acrobatics (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. As these metals are largely toxic to organic life, you also gain the Toxic Touch action.

Toxic Touch 1 (poison)

Frequency once per day

Requirements Your most recent action was to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Tumble Through], and you successfully moved through an enemy's space

Effect Make a melee unarmed Strike against the enemy whose space you moved through. On a hit, the target takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,poison]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (or takes 2d6 persistent poison and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical hit).
